sentence: A late endorsement On Saturday, Trump finally endorsed Doug Mastriano, a conspiracy-theory-minded retired military officer who leads polls in the governor's race, in an apparent attempt to hedge his bets.
title: Live Updates: What to Watch for in the Pennsylvania and North Carolina Primaries
